IKineNode Interface Reference
[KINE+ Module]

import "kineplus.idl";

Inheritance diagram for IKineNode:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

KINE+ generic hierarchy node.

Inherits IKineChild to form a fully functional hierarchy node, e.g. kinematical chain. Contains tools to build, control and access the tree structure of inherited nodes.

See also:
FreeWillPlus::KineBone class, the leading implementation.

Implementation in FreeWillPlus::KineBone

Definition at line 373 of file kineplus.idl.

HRESULT IKineNode::AddChildEx (  [in] LPOLESTR  pLabel,
[in] IKineChild *  p,
[in] BOOL  bSetParentalDep,
[out] IKineNode **  pParentNode,
[out] FWULONG *  pnIndex
) 
 

Extended form of IKineNode::AddChild (more).

Parameters:
pLabel: child label; may be fully qualified (see Naming and Namespaces)
p the child to be added
bSetParentalDep set itself as a Primary Parent (see IKineChild::OnParentNotify) and invalidate the child
Return values:
*pParentNode the parent node of the inserted child
*pnIndex the index of the inserted child (in *pParentNode namespace)
Returns:
:
  • KINE_E_LABELEXISTS if other object already exists under this label
  • KINE_E_LABELNOTFOUND if the qualified label cannot be resolved to identify position in the hierarchy
  • KINE_E_EMPTYLABEL if the given label is empty
Remarks:
Most often you will call this function instead of simpler AddChild to pass bSetParentalDep=FALSE. This enables to put an object more than once into the structure retaining singular kinematic dependancy. Objects added in this way will not use the kinematical parameters of its non-primary parent.

HRESULT IKineNode::GetChildEx (  [in, string] LPOLESTR  pLabel,
BOOL  bQuiet,
[out] IKineNode **  pParentNode,
[out] FWULONG *  nId,
[out, string] LPOLESTR *  pRemaining,
[out, retval] IKineChild **  p
) 
 

Extended form of IKineNode::GetChild (more).

Parameters:
pLabel: child label; may be fully qualified (see Naming and Namespaces)
bQuiet: if set no error code returned even if the label cannot be resolved (output is NULL and function returns S_FALSE)
Return values:
pParentNode: the parent node or last link of a fully qualified name chain if child not found
nId: id of a child, if found
pRemaining: in case of a fully qualified label cannot be resolved in full, returns its remaining part
*p: the child or NULL if not found
Returns:
:
  • KINE_E_EMPTYLABEL if the given label is empty
  • KINE_E_LABELNOTFOUND if the qualified label not found or cannot be resolved

HRESULT IKineNode::GetChildCount (  [out, retval] FWULONG *  nCount  ) 
 

Computes the child counter (more).

Return values:
*nCount the number of immediate child nodes, including the already deleted ones.
Remarks:
If any nodes have been deleted, the actual number of the still active child nodes may be lower.

HRESULT IKineNode::CreateFlatNamespace (   ) 
 

Creates a flat namespace (more).

Scans all the structure of descendant nodes and adds the reference as the immediate child nodes of the pNamespace node. This operation does not change the parentship of the descendant nodes
